name: Magical Dice Kids
overview: Magical Dice Kids is a board game in which the player (or players since the game allow up to 4 human players using the multi-tap) can play in vs or story mode in a 3d graphics board game. In the story mode the player controls a young kid in a 4 stage board game. To advance in the story it have to complete each stage. The gameplay is the usual in a board game, each player got a turn to roll the dice and advance through the board, in some squares there are different events, shops and items.
